channel.title: Super amazing source
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt]-------------------------Welcome To The Start Of Turmoil-Pkerz-------------------------[/size][/center]
- All RuneScape items from the 634th revision! These all have the correct models, and are 100% working! - All RuneScape graphics from the 525th revision! These of course are 100% working as well! - All RuneScape animations from the 602nd revision! As well as the items and graphics, these are also working 100%! - Working Dragon Claws, with the correct graphics and 4x hit on the special attack! The 4x hit applies to both on players, and on npc’s! This is 100% legitimate! - Working Godsword Special Attacks! This applies for the Godswords: Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Saradomin! That’s right, all four godswords! - Correct Godwars Dungeon (GWD) that features in RuneScape! Verse your favourite GWD Bosses here! - Working Tormented Demons! These drop a wide range of items! If you’re lucky, you’ll end up with a set of Dragon Claws! - The classic Corp Beast! Verse one - or if not, the strongest monster ever faced in RuneScape either solo, or with a team! This monster drops items of a great range, such as Spirit Shields! - Unique home that is extroadinarily easy to adapt to! There are many shops in this area, that sell a wide range of various items to assist you right throughout your journey! - 23 Skills working and 100% trainable! This works along with the 21 other skills - Extreme potions and overloads that are 100% working! - Features Minigames - that never get old, due to rapidly being used by other players! - Warriors Guild - Duel Arena - Tzhaar Pits (With Jad!) - Pest Control (Earn TPP - TurmoilPkerz Points for winning!) - Full Vengeance and Vengeance Other (Correct GFX’s & Anims) - 602 GFX’s/Items/NPC’s! - EVERY Spell in the Regular/Ancient Spell book working! 100% LEGITIMATE! - Active PK’ers, that counts for pures, zerkers, mains, and all the above! - Active Skillers! That’s right, we have MANY skillers - so skilling can NEVER get boring and you will never run out of competition! - Barrows - digging, barrows armor fixing, and you have to find your way to the middle! - Dagganoth Lairs, with the Dagg Kings, better use your Prayer! - Full Ancient Prayer Curses - protects even working! -Vote4Cash-----Reward 2 vote points -Donator-Points
[center][size=16pt]-------------------------Some Pictures-------------------------[/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/wertgfr.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/donator.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/2-2.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/7-1.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/88.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/11.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i1192.photobucket.com/albums/aa329/stnbarton1/c565d879edc857b0c3039e64074ec463.png[/img][/center]
Please Leave Comments Please Dont Troll Rep :D

item.title: Super amazing source
item.dc:creator: @stnbarton12 stnbarton12
item.description:
@stnbarton12 wrote:

[center][size=16pt]-------------------------Welcome To The Start Of Turmoil-Pkerz-------------------------[/size][/center]

  • All RuneScape items from the 634th revision! These all have the correct models, and are 100% working!
  • All RuneScape graphics from the 525th revision! These of course are 100% working as well!
  • All RuneScape animations from the 602nd revision! As well as the items and graphics, these are also working 100%!
  • Working Dragon Claws, with the correct graphics and 4x hit on the special attack! The 4x hit applies to both on players, and on npc’s! This is 100% legitimate!
  • Working Godsword Special Attacks! This applies for the Godswords: Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Saradomin! That’s right, all four godswords!
  • Correct Godwars Dungeon (GWD) that features in RuneScape! Verse your favourite GWD Bosses here!
  • Working Tormented Demons! These drop a wide range of items! If you’re lucky, you’ll end up with a set of Dragon Claws!
  • The classic Corp Beast! Verse one - or if not, the strongest monster ever faced in RuneScape either solo, or with a team! This monster drops items of a great range, such as Spirit Shields!
  • Unique home that is extroadinarily easy to adapt to! There are many shops in this area, that sell a wide range of various items to assist you right throughout your journey!
  • 23 Skills working and 100% trainable! This works along with the 21 other skills
  • Extreme potions and overloads that are 100% working!
  • Features Minigames - that never get old, due to rapidly being used by other players!
  • Warriors Guild
  • Duel Arena
  • Tzhaar Pits (With Jad!)
  • Pest Control (Earn TPP - TurmoilPkerz Points for winning!)
  • Full Vengeance and Vengeance Other (Correct GFX’s & Anims)
  • 602 GFX’s/Items/NPC’s!
  • EVERY Spell in the Regular/Ancient Spell book working! 100% LEGITIMATE!
  • Active PK’ers, that counts for pures, zerkers, mains, and all the above!
  • Active Skillers! That’s right, we have MANY skillers - so skilling can NEVER get boring and you will never run out of competition!
  • Barrows - digging, barrows armor fixing, and you have to find your way to the middle!
  • Dagganoth Lairs, with the Dagg Kings, better use your Prayer!
  • Full Ancient Prayer Curses - protects even working!
    -Vote4Cash-----Reward 2 vote points
    -Donator-Points
